name: bettercallclaude-fedlex-sparql
description: Look up Swiss federal legislation via the Fedlex SPARQL endpoint. Retrieve statutes, articles, and legislative metadata. Part of the BetterCallClaude Swiss Legal Intelligence suite.

tools.name: lookup_statute
tools.description: Look up a Swiss federal legal act by SR number or abbreviation (e.g., OR, ZGB)

tools.name: get_article
tools.description: Retrieve a specific article within a Swiss legal act with structured text

tools.name: search_legislation
tools.description: Search across Swiss federal legislation with full-text search and filters

tools.name: find_related
tools.description: Find legislation related to a specific act through amendments and citations

tools.name: get_metadata
tools.description: Get comprehensive metadata about a legal act including publication info and version history
